Dear Jerrys
Thank you so much for your cordial letter of April 15tfc„
Like you, I aw not in love with Bill Harley0s proposed re-organization
plan, I do, however, admire his initiative in presenting some sort of
plan—even a bad one.
In spite of numerous requests, no one else has sent we any part of
a plan for re-organization. All I have heard is irresponsible talk
about **the NAEB had better do this (or that)—or else.”
As you know, we, the members, are the NAEB. (This is not true of
some other organizations.) If reorganization is needed (and it is,
in my opinion), we have an obligation to propose methods of accomolishing it.
I would be most grateful to have your comments and those all other
NAEB members from ETV stations.
It was a pleasure to be with you at the Region II Conference, and
I look forward to seeing you soon again.
Cordially,
St. Paul 13, Minnesota
ccs Managers of all ETV
stations
NAEB Board
